title: Herbed Shrimp and Pasta (510 calories)
directions: 1. Cook spaghetti according to package directions. Drain. Keep warm. Set aside.Meanwhile, in small nonstick skillet melt butter. Add shrimp, lemon peel, red pepper and garlic. Cook over medium-high heat for 2 to 3 minutes or until shrimp turn opaque, stirring constantly. Carefully stir in lemon juice and basil. 3. Add spaghetti. Gently toss to combine. Serve immediately.
ingredients: 5 ounces medium shrimp, peeled and deveined
